	<div id="zaz-gambit" class="w1280" data-gambit="">
	<script type="text/javascript">
	window.G = {"conf" : {"windowSize" : 0}};

	var viewport = window.innerWidth || document.documentElement.clientWidth || document.body.clientWidth,
		stage = document.getElementById('zaz-gambit'),
		reducePage = false;

	if (viewport < 1024) {
		stage.setAttribute('class', 'w768');
		window.G.conf.windowSize = 768;
	} else if (viewport < 1280) {
		if(reducePage === true){
			stage.setAttribute('class', 'w768');
			window.G.conf.windowSize = 768;
		}else{
			stage.setAttribute('class', 'w1024');
			window.G.conf.windowSize = 1024;
		}
	} else if (viewport >= 1280) {
		if(reducePage === true){
			stage.setAttribute('class', 'w1024');
			window.G.conf.windowSize = 1024;
		}else{
			stage.setAttribute('class', 'w1280');
			window.G.conf.windowSize = 1280;
		}
	}
	</script><noscript>Scripts de configurações</noscript>

(function() {
    'use strict';
    if (!window.zaz || typeof window.zaz.use != 'function') {
        throw new Error('Framework not found as "window.zaz".');
    }
    window.zaz.use(function(pkg) {
        try {
            if (typeof pkg.includer != 'object') {
                throw new Error('Includer not delivered on this pkg');
            }
            if (includerComponents.length > 0) {
                pkg.includer.registerFetchedComponents(includerComponents[0].components);
            }
        } catch (e) {
            e.message = 'Error on Includer\'s reporter: ' + e.messsage;
            if (window.console && typeof window.console.error == 'function') {
                window.console.error(e);
            }
        }
    });
})();
</script><noscript>No content<!-- behavior layer --></noscript>

<!-- SETUP tgmkey="us.entertainment_virales.home" -->
<script type="text/javascript">
try { AdManager.set('backend_getviewport', { }) } catch(e) { };
var <script type="text/javascript">
zaz.use(function(pkg){
    pkg.require(['jQuery'], function($){
        window.jQuery = $;

        function async_load(script_url){
            var protocol = ('https:' == document.location.protocol ? 'https://' : 'http://');
            var s = document.createElement('script'); s.src = protocol + script_url;
            var x = document.getElementsByTagName('script')[0]; x.parentNode.insertBefore(s, x);
        }
        bm_website_code = '7023F36E0D374A04';
        jQuery(document).ready(function(){async_load('asset.pagefair.com/measure.min.js')});
    });
});    
</script><noscript><!-- no script mess here --></noscript>

	<script id="tPrograma" type="text/x-custom-template">
       <div class="comunicado">
     {LINK}
    <div class="titulo">{Title}</div>
     </a>  
        <div class="descritivo" style="height: 116px !important">
            {Descritivo}
        </div>
    </div>
    </script>
    <script type="text/javascript">
        SP.SOD.executeFunc('sp.js', 'SP.ClientContext', LoadComunicados);
        function LoadComunicados() {
            $(".maiscomunicados").empty();
            $(".maiscomunicados").append('<div class="titulo">Mais Comunicados</div>');
            _ctx = new SP.ClientContext.get_current();
            web = _ctx.get_web("/");
            var list = web.get_lists().getByTitle("Páginas");
            var caml = new SP.CamlQuery();
            var dtBusca = Utils.formatDateCamlQuery(new Date());
            caml.set_viewXml("<View Scope='Recursive'><Query><Where><And><Or><Eq><FieldRef Name='ContentType' /><Value Type='Computed'>Comunicados</Value></Eq><Eq><FieldRef Name='ContentType' /><Value Type='Computed'>Comunicado</Value></Eq></Or><Eq><FieldRef Name='Destaque' /><Value Type='Boolean'>1</Value></Eq></And></Where><OrderBy><FieldRef Name='ArticleStartDate' Ascending='FALSE' /></OrderBy></Query></View>");
            //caml.set_viewXml("<View Scope='Recursive'><Query><Where><And><And><Or><IsNull><FieldRef Name='VigenciaInicio'/></IsNull><Leq><FieldRef Name='VigenciaInicio'/><Value Type='DateTime' IncludeTimeValue='TRUE'>" + dtBusca + "</Value></Leq></Or><Or><IsNull><FieldRef Name='VigenciaFim'/></IsNull><Geq><FieldRef Name='VigenciaFim'/><Value Type='DateTime' IncludeTimeValue='TRUE'>" + dtBusca + "</Value></Geq></Or></And><Or><Eq><FieldRef Name='ContentType' /><Value Type='Computed'>Comunicados</Value></Eq><Eq><FieldRef Name='ContentType' /><Value Type='Computed'>Comunicado</Value></Eq></Or></And></Where><OrderBy><FieldRef Name='ArticleStartDate' Ascending='False' /></OrderBy></Query></View>");
            console.log(caml.get_viewXml());
            this.list_data = list.getItems(caml);
            _ctx.load(list_data);
            _ctx.executeQueryAsync(Function.createDelegate(this, this.onLoadComunicados), Function.createDelegate(this, function () {
                console.log("fnc - loadComunicados");
            }
            ));
        }

        function onLoadComunicados(sender, args) {
            var itens = list_data.getEnumerator();
            while (itens.moveNext()) {
                var d = new Date(itens.get_current().get_item("ArticleStartDate"));

                addComunicado(itens.get_current().get_item("Title"), itens.get_current().get_item("Resumo"), itens.get_current().get_item("FileRef"));
            }
            $(".comunicados > div.comunicado").hide();
            $(".comunicados > div.comunicado").eq(0).show();
            $(".comunicados > div.comunicado").hide();
            $(".comunicados > div.comunicado").eq(0).show();
            $("#setaNext").click(function () { nextComunicado() });
            $("#setaPrev").click(function () { prevComunicado() });


        }

        function nextComunicado() {
            var itens = $(".comunicados > div.comunicado").size() - 1;
            var actualPosition = 0;
            var position = 0;
            console.log(itens);
            $(".comunicados > div.comunicado").each(function () {
                if ($(this).css("display") == "block") {
                    actualPosition = $(this).index();
                    if (actualPosition < itens) {
                        position = $(this).index() + 1;
                    }
                    else {
                        position = 0;
                    }
                }
            });
            $(".comunicados > div.comunicado").eq(actualPosition).animate({ opacity: '0' }, 'normal', function () {
                $(".comunicados > div.comunicado").eq(position).animate({ opacity: '1' }, 'normal').fadeIn();
            }).fadeOut();
        }

        function prevComunicado() {
            hideVideos();
            var itens = $(".comunicados > div.comunicado").size() - 1;
            var actualPosition = 0;
            var position = 0;
            $(".comunicados > div.comunicado").each(function () {
                if ($(this).css("display") == "block") {
                    actualPosition = $(this).index();
                    if (actualPosition > 0) {
                        position = $(this).index() - 1;
                    }
                    else {
                        position = itens;
                    }
                }
            });
            $(".comunicados > div.comunicado").eq(actualPosition).animate({ opacity: '0' }, 'normal', function () {
                $(".comunicados > div.comunicado").eq(position).animate({ opacity: '1' }, 'normal').fadeIn();
            }).fadeOut();
        }

        function onError(sender, args) {
            console.log('Falha :(');
            console.log(args.get_message());
            console.log(args.get_stackTrace());
        }

        function addComunicado(title, Descricao, url) {
            var $template = $("#tPrograma").text();
            $template = replaceTemplate($template, "{Title}", title);
            /*if (Descricao != null && Descricao.length > 100) {
                Descricao = Descricao.substring(0, 100)
            }*/
            $template = replaceTemplate($template, "{Descritivo}", Descricao);
            $template = replaceTemplate($template, "{LINK}", '<a href="' + url + '">');
            $(".comunicados").prepend($template);
        }

        function replaceTemplate(text, val1, val2) {
            while (text.indexOf(val1) > 0)
                text = text.replace(val1, val2);
            return text;
        }
        
        $(window).load(function() {
		    var loopRotatorA =
		    {
		        init: function()
		        {
		            var iFadeIn = 5000;
		            var itemInter = 10000;
		            var fadTime = 3000;
		            var numbItems = $('.comunicado').length;
		            var curItem = 1;
		 
		            $('.comunicado').eq(curItem).fadeIn(iFadeIn);
		 
		 			if(numbItems > 1){
			            var loopRotatorB = setInterval(function(){
			                $('.comunicado').eq(curItem).fadeOut(fadTime);
			 
			                if(curItem== numbItems -1){
			                    curItem= 0;
			                }else{
			                    curItem++;
			                }
			                $('.comunicado').eq(curItem).fadeIn(fadTime);                 
			            }, itemInter);
		            }
		        }
		    }; 
	    	loopRotatorA.init();
		});
    </script>

        function mostrarmenu(id) {
            var e = document.getElementById(id);
            if (e.style.display == 'block')
                e.style.display = 'none';
            else
                e.style.display = 'block';
        }

		});

<script type="text/javascript">
//<![CDATA[
var theForm = document.forms['aspnetForm'];
if (!theForm) {
    theForm = document.aspnetForm;
}
function __doPostBack(eventTarget, eventArgument) {
    if (!theForm.onsubmit || (theForm.onsubmit() != false)) {
        theForm.__EVENTTARGET.value = eventTarget;
        theForm.__EVENTARGUMENT.value = eventArgument;
        theForm.submit();
    }
}
//]]>
</script>

<script type="text/javascript">
//<![CDATA[
(function(){

        if (typeof(_spBodyOnLoadFunctions) === 'undefined' || _spBodyOnLoadFunctions === null) {
            return;
        }
        _spBodyOnLoadFunctions.push(function() 
        {
          ExecuteOrDelayUntilScriptLoaded(
            function()
            {
              var pairs = SP.ScriptHelpers.getDocumentQueryPairs();
              var followDoc, itemId, listId, docName;
              for (var key in pairs)
              {
                if(key.toLowerCase() == 'followdocument') 
                  followDoc = pairs[key];
                else if(key.toLowerCase() == 'itemid') 
                  itemId = pairs[key];
                else if(key.toLowerCase() == 'listid') 
                  listId = pairs[key];
                else if(key.toLowerCase() == 'docname') 
                  docName = decodeURI(pairs[key]);
              } 

              if(followDoc != null && followDoc == '1' && listId!=null && itemId != null && docName != null)
              {
                SP.SOD.executeFunc('followingcommon.js', 'FollowDocumentFromEmail', function() 
                { 
                  FollowDocumentFromEmail(itemId, listId, docName);
                });
              }

            }, 'SP.init.js');

        });
    })();(function(){

        if (typeof(_spBodyOnLoadFunctions) === 'undefined' || _spBodyOnLoadFunctions === null) {
            return;
        }
        _spBodyOnLoadFunctions.push(function() {

            if (typeof(SPClientTemplates) === 'undefined' || SPClientTemplates === null || (typeof(APD_InAssetPicker) === 'function' && APD_InAssetPicker())) {
                return;
            }

            var renderFollowFooter = function(renderCtx,  calloutActionMenu)
            {
                if (renderCtx.ListTemplateType == 700) 
                    myDocsActionsMenuPopulator(renderCtx, calloutActionMenu);
                else
                    CalloutOnPostRenderTemplate(renderCtx, calloutActionMenu);

                var listItem = renderCtx.CurrentItem;
                if (typeof(listItem) === 'undefined' || listItem === null) {
                    return;
                }
                if (listItem.FSObjType == 0) {
                    calloutActionMenu.addAction(new CalloutAction({
                        text: Strings.STS.L_CalloutFollowAction,
                        tooltip: Strings.STS.L_CalloutFollowAction_Tooltip,
                        onClickCallback: function (calloutActionClickEvent, calloutAction) {
                            var callout = GetCalloutFromRenderCtx(renderCtx);
                            if (!(typeof(callout) === 'undefined' || callout === null))
                                callout.close();
                            SP.SOD.executeFunc('followingcommon.js', 'FollowSelectedDocument', function() { FollowSelectedDocument(renderCtx); });
                        }
                    }));
                }
            };

            var registerOverride = function(id) {
                var followingOverridePostRenderCtx = {};
                followingOverridePostRenderCtx.BaseViewID = 'Callout';
                followingOverridePostRenderCtx.ListTemplateType = id;
                followingOverridePostRenderCtx.Templates = {};
                followingOverridePostRenderCtx.Templates.Footer = function(renderCtx) {
                    var  renderECB;
                    if (typeof(isSharedWithMeView) === 'undefined' || isSharedWithMeView === null) {
                        renderECB = true;
                    } else {
                        var viewCtx = getViewCtxFromCalloutCtx(renderCtx);
                        renderECB = !isSharedWithMeView(viewCtx);
                    }
                    return CalloutRenderFooterTemplate(renderCtx, renderFollowFooter, renderECB);
                };
                SPClientTemplates.TemplateManager.RegisterTemplateOverrides(followingOverridePostRenderCtx);
            }
            registerOverride(101);
            registerOverride(700);
        });
    })();if (typeof(DeferWebFormInitCallback) == 'function') DeferWebFormInitCallback();function WebForm_OnSubmit() {
UpdateFormDigest('\u002f', 1440000);if (typeof(_spFormOnSubmitWrapper) != 'undefined') {return _spFormOnSubmitWrapper();} else {return true;};
return true;
}

	<div id="MSOZoneCell_WebPartctl00_ctl20_g_17678eeb_58a4_4e95_b3bf_394eeae84eaf" class="s4-wpcell-plain ms-webpartzone-cell ms-webpart-cell-vertical ms-fullWidth ">

			<div WebPartID="17678eeb-58a4-4e95-b3bf-394eeae84eaf" HasPers="false" id="WebPartctl00_ctl20_g_17678eeb_58a4_4e95_b3bf_394eeae84eaf" width="100%" class="ms-WPBody noindex " allowDelete="false" allowExport="false" style="" ><div id="ctl00_ctl20_g_17678eeb_58a4_4e95_b3bf_394eeae84eaf">

              </div></div></div><div class="banner"><div class="img" style="background-image:url('/Banners/A Lei do Amor 1.png')" onclick="&#xA;                window.open('http://negocios8.redeglobo.com.br/Programas/Paginas/aleidoamor.aspx');&#xA;              ">
             
          </div><div class="descritivo" onclick="&#xA;                  window.open('http://negocios8.redeglobo.com.br/Programas/Paginas/aleidoamor.aspx');&#xA;                "><div class="titulo">A Lei do Amor 
              </div><div class="subtitulo">A Novela III da Globo 
              </div></div></div><div class="banner"><div class="img" style="background-image:url('/Banners/Jornal da Globo.png')" onclick="&#xA;                window.open('http://negocios8.redeglobo.com.br/Programas/Paginas/jornaldaglobo.aspx');&#xA;              ">
             
          </div><div class="descritivo" onclick="&#xA;                  window.open('http://negocios8.redeglobo.com.br/Programas/Paginas/jornaldaglobo.aspx');&#xA;                "><div class="titulo">Jornal da Globo 
              </div><div class="subtitulo">O jornal da noite de segunda a sexta 
              </div></div></div><div class="setas prev"> </div><div class="setas next"> </div></div>

			</div><div class="ms-clear"></div></div>
		</div>
	</div>
</div>

    <div class="midiakit">
        <div class="titulorapido acesso"><span>Acesso Rápido</span></div>
        <div class="titulorapido comunicado desktop"><span>Comunicado</span></div>
        <div class="acessorapido">
            <div class="ms-webpart-zone ms-fullWidth">
	<div id="MSOZoneCell_WebPartctl00_ctl20_g_7e24529e_ec11_47ad_86dd_c5d849e4d103" class="s4-wpcell-plain ms-webpartzone-cell ms-webpart-cell-horizontal ">
		<div class="ms-webpart-chrome ms-webpart-chrome-fullWidth ">
			<div WebPartID="7e24529e-ec11-47ad-86dd-c5d849e4d103" HasPers="false" id="WebPartctl00_ctl20_g_7e24529e_ec11_47ad_86dd_c5d849e4d103" width="100%" class="ms-WPBody noindex " allowDelete="false" allowExport="false" style="" ><div id="ctl00_ctl20_g_7e24529e_ec11_47ad_86dd_c5d849e4d103">

<h5>Comunicar Erro</h5>
<form action="/r7/service/contactus/addContactUsSimple.jsp" onsubmit="validaCampos(this, event)" target="postcontactus" method="post" name="form_contactus">
<fieldset>
<div class="desc">Preencha os campos abaixo para informar o R7 sobre os erros encontrados nas nossas reportagens.</div>
<div id="msg-callback">

<span class="iconOk"></span>
Mensagem enviada com Sucesso!
</div>

<span class="iconAlert"></span>
Erro ao enviar mensagem, tente novamente!
</div>
</div>
